description: This notification is generated whenever a FLOGI
is denied due to enforced port bindings on the
local device on a F/FL port.

event.Summary: FLOGI has been denied due to port bindings on F/FL port $v2

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CISCO-PSM-MIB::ciscoPsmPortBindFPortDenyNotify CISCO-PSM-MIB::cpsmPortBindLoginPwwn s EXAMPLES CISCO-PSM-MIB::cpsmPortBindLoginPort s EXAMPLES CISCO-PSM-MIB::cpsmPortBindLoginTime t 31536000

description: This notification is generated whenever a switch
is denied due to enforced port bindings on the
local device on a E port.

event.Summary: Switch Login has been denied due to port bindings on E port $v2

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CISCO-PSM-MIB::ciscoPsmPortBindEPortDenyNotify CISCO-PSM-MIB::cpsmPortBindLoginSwwn s EXAMPLES CISCO-PSM-MIB::cpsmPortBindLoginPort s EXAMPLES CISCO-PSM-MIB::cpsmPortBindLoginTime t 31536000

description: This notification is generated whenever a device
is not allowed to join the fabric due to
enforced fabric bindings on the local device.

event.Summary: A device that attempted to join the fabric has been denied due to enforced fabric bindings

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CISCO-PSM-MIB::ciscoPsmFabricBindDenyNotify CISCO-PSM-MIB::cpsmFabricBindSwwn s EXAMPLES CISCO-PSM-MIB::cpsmFabricBindLocalPort s EXAMPLES CISCO-PSM-MIB::cpsmFabricBindDenialTime t 31536000

description: This notification is generated whenever a device
is not allowed to join the fabric due to
enforced fabric bindings on the local device.

event.Summary: A device that attempted to join the fabric has been denied due to enforced fabric bindings with reason: $v3

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CISCO-PSM-MIB::ciscoPsmFabricBindDenyNotifyNew CISCO-PSM-MIB::cpsmFabricBindSwwnR1 s EXAMPLES CISCO-PSM-MIB::cpsmFabricBindDenialTimeR1 t 31536000 CISCO-PSM-MIB::cpsmFabricBindDenialReasonCode i 1
